name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: Latest Samsung smartphone with high-end features including a 120Hz AMOLED display, Exynos 2100 processor, and a triple camera system. Includes 128GB storage and 8GB RAM. Barely used, in perfect condition with original packaging and accessories.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: Industry-leading noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with up to 30 hours of battery life. Features adaptive sound control, speak-to-chat technology, and touch controls. Includes carrying case, charging cable, and audio cable for wired use.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: High-performance laptop with a sleek design, featuring an Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. The 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display offers stunning 4K resolution. Perfect for professionals and students needing reliable computing power.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Stylish and comfortable sneakers with Nike's largest Air unit yet in the heel for maximum comfort. Features a breathable mesh upper and cushioned midsole. Worn only a few times, almost like new. Size US 10 men's.

name: Adidas Ultraboost
description: High-performance running shoes with responsive Boost midsole and Primeknit upper for adaptive support and comfort. Features Continental™ Rubber outsole for extraordinary grip. Perfect for long-distance running or casual wear. Size UK 9.

name: Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses
description: Classic aviator sunglasses with polarized lenses that reduce glare and enhance visual clarity. Features gold metal frames and green G-15 lenses. Includes original case and cleaning cloth. Authentic Ray-Ban product with UV protection.

name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
description: Classic straight leg denim jeans with button fly and five-pocket styling. Made from high-quality denim that gets better with age. Medium wash with slight fading for a vintage look. Size 32W x 32L. Only worn a few times.

name: Canon EOS R5
description: Professional-grade mirrorless camera with 45MP full-frame CMOS sensor and DIGIC X processor. Capable of 8K RAW video recording and 20fps continuous shooting. Includes dual card slots, 5-axis IBIS, and weather sealing. Comes with battery, charger, and 24-105mm lens.

name: GoPro HERO9
description: Versatile action camera for adventure enthusiasts with 5K video recording and 20MP photos. Includes waterproof case for underwater photography up to 33ft. Features HyperSmooth 3.0 stabilization, TimeWarp 3.0, and front display for vlogging. Perfect for travel, sports, and outdoor activities.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+
description: Premium portable Bluetooth speaker with 360° sound and deep, loud bass. Features water-resistant design, built-in microphone for calls, and up to 16 hours of battery life. Includes charging cradle and carrying handle for easy transport. Perfect for parties, outdoor gatherings, or home use.

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9
description: High-performance tablet with stunning Liquid Retina XDR display and M1 chip for laptop-level performance. Features 256GB storage, Face ID, and support for Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard. Perfect for creative professionals, students, or entertainment. Includes charger and original box.

name: Fossil Men's Leather Wallet
description: Premium bifold leather wallet with RFID blocking technology to protect your cards from unauthorized scanning. Features 8 card slots, 2 bill compartments, and ID window. Made from genuine leather with contrast stitching. Perfect everyday wallet for the modern man.

name: Tiffany & Co. Diamond Engagement Ring
description: Stunning 1.2 carat diamond solitaire ring-3 set in platinum. Features Tiffany's signature six-prong setting that maximizes the diamond's brilliance. Diamond is VS1 clarity with E color grade. Includes original blue box, certificate of authenticity, and receipt. Perfect for a special proposal.

name: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy Box Set
description: Complete hardcover box set of J.R.R. Tolkien's epic fantasy masterpiece. This special collector's edition includes all three volumes (The Fellowship of the Ring, The Two Towers, and The Return of the King) with original dust jackets and a foldout map of Middle-earth. Perfect condition, never read.

name: IKEA MALM Queen Bed Frame
description: Minimalist Scandinavian design bed frame with clean lines and wood veneer finish. Features adjustable bed sides to allow use of mattresses of different heights. Includes slatted bed base for added comfort. Purchased last year and in excellent condition. Disassembled for easy transport.

name: Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum
description: Powerful cordless vacuum with intelligent suction optimization and up to 60 minutes of run time. Features LCD screen that displays remaining run time and performance, HEPA filtration, and multiple cleaning attachments. Perfect for all floor types and pet hair. Includes wall-mounted dock and charger.

name: SK-II Facial Treatment Essence
description: Luxury skincare product containing over 90% Pitera, a bio-ingredient rich in vitamins, minerals, and amino acids that promotes skin's natural renewal process. Helps improve skin texture, reduce dark spots, and enhance radiance. 230ml bottle, used only twice. Authentic product purchased from Sephora.

name: Peloton Exercise Bike
description: Premium stationary exercise bike with 22-inch HD touchscreen for streaming live and on-demand classes. Features adjustable seat and handlebars, silent belt drive, and magnetic resistance for smooth, quiet workouts. Includes cleats for clip-in pedals and heart rate monitor. Used for only 6 months.

name: LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon
description: Massive 7,541-piece collector's edition of the iconic Star Wars spacecraft. Features detailed exterior and interior, including the cockpit, main hold, and gunner stations. Includes minifigures of Han Solo, Chewbacca, Princess Leia, and more. Assembled once and displayed in smoke-free home.

name: Michelin All-Season Tires Set of 4
description: Premium all-season tires with excellent wet and dry traction, comfortable ride, and long tread life. Size 225/65R17, perfect for SUVs and crossovers. Used for only 5,000 miles before upgrading vehicle. Tread depth is approximately 9/10ths of original. Great value for high-quality tires.
